summary: Comprehensive testing of Agenda and Berita features completed. All backend API tests passed (18/18). Frontend UI tests passed for Admin Agenda page, Admin Berita page, HomePage sections, and NewsPopup.
passed_tests: Backend: Health check endpoint
Backend: Admin login with credentials admin@gorontaloutara.go.id / Admin123!
Backend: Admin login rejects invalid credentials
Backend: GET /api/agenda returns all agenda items
Backend: GET /api/agenda/upcoming returns upcoming/ongoing agenda only
Backend: POST /api/agenda creates new agenda with status 'upcoming'
Backend: PUT /api/agenda/{id} updates agenda fields and status
Backend: DELETE /api/agenda/{id} removes agenda
Backend: GET /api/berita returns all berita items
Backend: GET /api/berita/active returns only active berita
Backend: POST /api/berita creates new berita with is_active=true
Backend: PUT /api/berita/{id} updates berita fields
Backend: DELETE /api/berita/{id} removes berita
Backend: Toggle berita is_active status works correctly
Backend: GET /api/settings includes berita_popup_interval
Backend: PUT /api/settings updates berita_popup_interval
Frontend: Admin login flow works with provided credentials
Frontend: Sidebar shows 'Kelola Agenda' and 'Kelola Berita' menus
Frontend: Admin Agenda page loads with existing agenda data
Frontend: Add Agenda dialog opens with all required fields
Frontend: Create agenda form submission works with success toast
Frontend: Admin Berita page loads with popup interval settings
Frontend: Add Berita dialog opens with all required fields
Frontend: Create berita form submission works with success toast
Frontend: Image preview shows when URL is entered in berita form
Frontend: HomePage shows 'Agenda Penanaman' section with agenda cards
Frontend: HomePage shows 'Berita Terbaru' section with berita cards
Frontend: NewsPopup appears on HomePage after 2 seconds
Frontend: NewsPopup shows berita title, description, and image
seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up: 1 test agenda, 1 test berita
context_for_next_testing_agent: Agenda and Berita features are fully functional. Backend APIs at /api/agenda and /api/berita support full CRUD operations. Frontend admin pages at /admin/agenda and /admin/berita have working forms with proper validation. NewsPopup component displays active berita on public pages with configurable interval (default 5 seconds). Test file at /app/tests/test_agenda_berita.py covers all backend API tests for these features.
